Forgive this totally noob style question but how can I get my kerbal to sit in the command chair pod? I get my kerbal onto the rover but no matter what i try I cant get him to sit, so every time the rover moves he falls off!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T07:18:09Z" title="05/17/2015 07:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by maceemiller**
While controlling your Kerbal right click the seat and select Board.

> 
> While controlling your Kerbal right click the seat and select Board.
